TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AutoGeneratedField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField
Public NotInheritable Class AutoGeneratedField Inherits BoundField
public ref class AutoGeneratedField sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::BoundField

summary.span: 代表資料繫結控制項中自動產生的欄位。

span.span: Represents an automatically generated field in a data-bound control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來代表在資料繫結控制項中，自動產生的欄位，例如或。The class is used to represent an automatically generated field in a data-bound control, such as or . 當適當的屬性設定為時自動產生的欄位會建立資料繫結控制項`true`(例如，屬性控制項，屬性控制項，等等）。Automatically generated fields are created by a data-bound control when the appropriate property is set to `true` (for example, the property for the control, the property for the control, and so on). > [!NOTE] > 自動產生的欄位不會加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合 (例如，集合控制項，集合控制項，依此類推)。Automatically generated fields are not added to the field collection of a data-bound control (for example, the collection for the control, the collection for the control, and so on). 類別適用於內部資料繫結控制項。The class is intended for use internally by data-bound controls. 不同於其他資料欄位 (例如， ，等等)，則類別不能置於以宣告方式頁面做為欄位集合的一部分。Unlike other data fields (such as , , , and so on), the class cannot be placed declaratively on a page as part of a field collection. 雖然您可以透過程式設計方式新增物件欄位集合，應該避免這種設計模式。Although you can programmatically add an object to a field collection, this design pattern should be avoided. 自動產生的欄位代表的欄位自動轉譯，因為資料繫結控制項通常不會允許使用者修改的屬性物件。Because automatically generated fields represent the automatic rendering of a field, data-bound controls do not typically allow users to modify the properties of the objects. 如果自動呈現不是適用於您的需求，定義您自己的資料欄位的控制項的欄位集合。If the automatic rendering is not suitable for your needs, define your own data fields for the field collection of the control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立物件的自訂控制項衍生自控制項。The following example demonstrates how to create an object for a custom control that derives from the control. [!code-csharp[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/CS/SimpleCustomControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/VB/SimpleCustomControl.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的資料欄位，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified data field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 這個建構函式通常由資料繫結控制項 (例如和) 時建立會自動產生欄位。This constructor is generally used by data-bound controls (such as and ) when creating automatically generated fields. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別時實作自訂控制項衍生自控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to create a new instance of the class when implementing a custom control that derives from the control. [!code-csharp[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/CS/SimpleCustomControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/VB/SimpleCustomControl.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出從資料來源擷取欄位值時，是否將空字串 ("") 值轉換成 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string ("") values are converted to when the field values are retrieved from the data source.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時欄位的值為空字串 ("") 中的資料來源。Sometimes a field's value is an empty string ("") in the data source. 屬性用來指出是否將空字串值轉換成`null`才會顯示在。The property is used to indicate whether empty string values are converted to `null` before being displayed in an . > [!NOTE] > 這個版本的屬性已實作永遠傳回`true`。This version of the property has been implemented to always return `true`. 您不可以設定這個屬性。It is not possible to set this property.

span.span: An attempt is made to set this property.

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，指定 物件中每個影像之替代文字的呈現格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.
Always returns an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來將特殊格式套用到顯示中的值物件。The property is used to apply a special format to the values displayed in an object. > [!NOTE] > 這個版本的屬性已經實作以一律會傳回空字串表示，將未將特殊格式套用至欄位值。This version of the property has been implemented to always return an empty string to indicate that no special formatting is applied to the field values. 您不可以設定這個屬性。It is not possible to set this property.

span.span: An attempt is made to set this property.

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件中顯示之值的資料類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the data type of the values displayed in an object.

value.span: ，代表 物件中顯示之值的資料類型。

span.span: A that represents the data type of the value displayed in an object.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定顯示之值的資料型別物件。Use the property to specify the data type of the values displayed in an object. 資料類型會決定哪些類型的控制項呈現在來顯示值的物件。The data type determines what type of control is rendered in an object to display the value. 當的型別，例如，顯示核取方塊控制項。For example, a check box control is displayed when the type is . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定欄位值的資料類型，以程式設計方式建立時中自訂控制項衍生自物件控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data type of the field values when programmatically creating an object in a custom control that derives from the control. [!code-csharp[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/CS/SimpleCustomControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/VB/SimpleCustomControl.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ExtractValuesFromCell (System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary dictionary, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell cell, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState rowState, bool includeReadOnly);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ExtractValuesFromCell(class System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary dictionary, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell cell, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState rowState, bool includeReadOnly) cil managed

span.span: An used to store the values of the specified cell.
The that contains the values to retrieve.
One of the values.

param.span: 值 只包含唯讀欄位的值，否則為 。

span.span: The value includes only the values of read-only fields; otherwise, .

summary.span: 使用指定 物件的值填入指定的 物件。

span.span: Fills the specified object with the values from the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來擷取欄位的值從指定物件存放至物件。The method is a helper method used to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified object in an object. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 這個方法不會傳回值。This method does not have a return value. 相反地，將欄位值傳回透過傳物件傳入的`dictionary`參數。Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter. 在呼叫方法之後，逐一查看物件來存取的欄位值。After the method has been called, iterate through the object to access the field values. > [!NOTE] > 若要包含在唯讀欄位值物件，傳入`true`如`includeReadOnly`參數。To include the read-only field values in the object, pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 物件在插入模式中是否可見。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the object is visible in insert mode.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在資料繫結會控制該插入記錄的支援 (例如控制項)，則屬性用來指定是否資料繫結控制項處於插入模式時，會顯示物件。In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the control), the property is used to specify whether the object is displayed when the data-bound control is in insert mode. > [!NOTE] > 這個版本的屬性已實作永遠傳回`true`。This version of the property has been implemented to always return `true`. 您不可以設定這個屬性。It is not possible to set this property.

span.span: An attempt is made to set this property.

public override void ValidateSupportsCallback ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateSupportsCallback() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();

summary.span: 決定 物件中包含的控制項是否支援回呼。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷控制項是否包含在支援回呼的物件。The method is the helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks. 這個方法已經作為空方法 （不包含任何程式碼的方法），表示支援回呼實作。This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫此方法，指出是否根據欄位支援回呼所包含的控制項。Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks. 若要指出支援回呼，實作這個方法作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況。有用的訊息，說明為什麼不支援回呼，否則擲回例外狀況。To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
